```{r, setup, include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
library(tidyr)
# Load additional packages here 
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  tidy=FALSE,     # display code as typed
  size="small")   # slightly smaller font for code
```


```{r}
FilteredEBPMay27[1, 4] = "Problem ID/Referral, Education"
```

```{r}
FilteredEBPMay27 <-separate(data = FilteredEBPMay27, col = Strategy, into = c("Strategy1", "Strategy2"), sep = "\\,")
```

```{r}
FilteredEBPMay271 <- FilteredEBPMay27 %>%
  unite("Description & Link", c(`Description (2-3 Sentences)`, Link), sep = "\n", remove = FALSE)

```
